objectives: Students will discuss family and relationships using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to family and relationships
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining family and relationships content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore family and relationships through a Romance lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving family and relationships

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to family and relationships in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about family and relationships using formal register
Students create original romance themed content about family and relationships in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe family and relationships in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in family and relationships?
Can you create a Romance story about family and relationships?
How does family and relationships change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving family and relationships
roles: Character A: Using formal register in romance context
Character B: Responding in formal register within romance theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
